alert.note: Alert for De Soto; Red River; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 7:28PM CDT until March 31 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... West central Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Shelby County in eastern Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 727 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Logansport, or 14 miles southwest of Mansfield, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. This storm has a history of producing very large hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Logansport, Converse, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Huxley, South Mansfield, Stanley, Pelican, Evelyn and Rambin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern Texas. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, if one is spotted, act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure such as a basement or small interior room.
